remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 介面提供的對象為所有要參與工作流程執行階段引擎批次處理機制的服務。The interface is provided for services that want to participate in the workflow runtime engine batching mechanism. 批次處理機制對於使用長期存放區的服務特別有用。The batching mechanism is especially useful for services that use a durable store. 在這些情況中，保持服務使用的長期存放區與工作流程執行階段引擎內部狀態之間的一致性相當重要。It is often important in these cases to maintain consistency between the durable store used by the service and the internal state of the workflow runtime engine. 如果想要讓您的服務參與 提供的工作流程交易批次處理，必須實作 介面定義的方法。If you want your service to participate in workflow transaction batching provided by the , you must implement the methods defined by the interface. 工作流程執行階段引擎將呼叫您服務上的 方法以認可批次。The workflow runtime engine will call the method on your service to commit the batch. 類別會實作 介面。The class implements the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當其語意 (Semantics) 指示應認可工作批次中的暫止工作時，工作流程執行階段引擎會呼叫 方法。The workflow runtime engine calls the method when its semantics dictate that the pending work in the work batch should be committed. 達到認可點時，工作流程執行階段引擎會呼叫其工作批次中每個 物件上的 方法。工作流程執行階段引擎會將該 物件關聯的項目集合傳遞給 方法。When it reaches a commit point, the workflow runtime engine calls the method on each object in its work batch; the workflow runtime engine passes the method the collection of items associated with that object. 批次中的所有工作都會成功，不然就是都不會成功。Either all of the work in a batch succeeds or none of it succeeds. 如果傳遞到實作中 方法的任何工作項目無法認可時，則應該擲出例外狀況。You should throw an exception if any of the work items passed to the method in your implementation cannot be committed. 視您的實作而定，如果 方法無法認可其工作項目，也許可以在其中執行復原。Depending on your implementation, you may want to perform some rollback in your method if it cannot commit its work items. 如果工作流程執行階段引擎成功認可工作批次中的所有工作，將會呼叫 參數設定為 `succeeded` 的 `true`，否則，便呼叫 設定為 `succeeded` 的 `false`。If the workflow runtime engine successfully commits all of the work in the work batch, it calls with the `succeeded` parameter set to `true`; otherwise, it calls with `succeeded` set to `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 傳回 `false`，表示工作可能延後到未來的認可點。If returns `false`, the work can be postponed to a future commit point. 如果必須認可任何項目，則傳回 `true` 且將在目前的認可點認可所有項目。If any of the items must be committed, then return `true` and all items will be committed at the current commit point. 如需可能認可點的討論資訊，請參閱 類別。For a discussion about possible commit points, see the class.
